articles.title: 'No Fear Against Sachin Tendulkar as he Won't Hurt You Like Virender Sehwag' - News18
articles.description: Spin legend Muttiah Muralitharan says he didn't fear bowling to the great Sachin Tendulkar as the Indian maestro wouldn't hurt him like a Virender Sehwag or a Brian Lara.
articles.content:
